title: NY Belongs To The Knicks, Clippers Dodge Lakers... For Now
description:
Brian Windhorst, Ramona Shelburne and Vanity Fair’s Lisa Robinson discuss her beloved New York Knicks, NBA players’ reluctance to speak to the media, the LA Clippers avoiding the LA Lakers in the playoffs – for now and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
